name: Savory Pumpkin Hummus Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: chickpeas, pumpkin puree, olive oil, garlic, salt, paprika, fresh rosemary, lemon juice, pita chip
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine chickpeas, pumpkin, olive oil, garlic, salt, paprika, rosemary and lemon juice in a food processor or blender, and blend until smooth. Add more olive oil or water as necessary to reach desired consistency.
